00223         long                                                                                                            IntersectRayTriangle( const Vec3<double> & P0, const Vec3<double> & dir, 
00224                                                                                                                                                                           const Vec3<double> & V0, const Vec3<double> & V1, 
00225                                                                                                                                                                           const Vec3<double> & V2, double &t);
00226 
00227         // intersect_RayTriangle(): intersect a ray with a 3D triangle
00228         //    Input:  a ray R, and a triangle T
00229         //    Output: *I = intersection point (when it exists)
00230         //    Return: -1 = triangle is degenerate (a segment or point)
00231         //             0 = disjoint (no intersect)
00232         //             1 = intersect in unique point I1
00233         //             2 = are in the same plane
00234         long                                                                                                            IntersectRayTriangle2(const Vec3<double> & P0, const Vec3<double> & dir, 
00235                                                                                                                                                                            const Vec3<double> & V0, const Vec3<double> & V1, 
00236                                                                                                                                                                            const Vec3<double> & V2, double &r);
00237 
00238     /*
00239      Calculate the line segment PaPb that is the shortest route between
00240      two lines P1P2 and P3P4. Calculate also the values of mua and mub where
00241      Pa = P1 + mua (P2 - P1)
00242      Pb = P3 + mub (P4 - P3)
00243      Return FALSE if no solution exists.
00244      */
00245     bool                                                        IntersectLineLine(const Vec3<double> & p1, const Vec3<double> & p2, 
00246                                                                                   const Vec3<double> & p3, const Vec3<double> & p4,
00247                                                                                   Vec3<double> & pa, Vec3<double> & pb, 
00248                                                                                   double & mua, double &mub);
00249 }
